          <title>
            <string language="en">Iron-making in a blast furnace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisenproduktion in einem Hochofen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication de fer dans un haut fourneau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Iron-making em um alto-forno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fabbricazione del ferro in un forno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Iron-making σε έναν φούρνο φυσήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producción de hierro en un alto horno alto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how iron is made from coke, limestone and iron ore using a blast furnace.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron ore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">limestone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metallurgy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slag</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Eisen vom Koks, vom 
Kalkstein und vom Eisenerz mit einem Hochofen gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment du fer est fait
à partir du minerai de coke, de pierre à chaux et de fer à l'aide 
d'un haut fourneau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o ferro é feito do
minério do coke, da pedra calcária e de ferro usando um alto-forno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il ferro è 
fatto da coke, da calcare e dal minerale ferroso per mezzo di un 
forno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς ο σίδηρος γίνεται 
από το μετάλλευμα κοκ, ασβεστόλιθων και σιδήρου χρησιμοποιώντας 
έναν φούρνο φυσήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el hierro se hace
del mineral del coque, de la piedra caliza y de hierro usando un alto 
horno alto.</string>
          </description>
